Uses of Class
com.azure.data.cosmos.IndexingPolicy

    • Uses of IndexingPolicy in com.azure.data.cosmos

      Methods in com.azure.data.cosmos that return IndexingPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndexingPolicy IndexingPolicy.automatic(boolean automatic)
      Sets whether automatic indexing is enabled for a collection.
      IndexingPolicy IndexingPolicy.compositeIndexes(List<List<CompositePath>> compositeIndexes)
      Sets the composite indexes for additional indexes.
      IndexingPolicy IndexingPolicy.excludedPaths(List<ExcludedPath> excludedPaths) 
      IndexingPolicy IndexingPolicy.indexingMode(IndexingMode indexingMode)
      Sets the indexing mode (consistent or lazy).
      IndexingPolicy CosmosContainerProperties.indexingPolicy()
      Gets the container's indexing policy.
      IndexingPolicy IndexingPolicy.spatialIndexes(List<SpatialSpec> spatialIndexes)
      Sets the spatial indexes for additional indexes.
